allowed_origins.description: Allowed origins. Use ["*"] to allow any origin (not compatible with credentials). Supports wildcard patterns like "*.example.com".

allowed_methods.description: Allowed HTTP methods for CORS requests

allowed_headers.description: Allowed request headers. Use ["*"] to allow any header. Simple headers (Accept, Accept-Language, Content-Language, Content-Type) are always allowed.

expose_headers.description: Headers to expose to the client in Access-Control-Expose-Headers

max_age.description: Max age for preflight cache in seconds

allow_credentials.description: Whether to allow credentials (cookies, auth headers). Cannot be used with allowed_origins: ["*"]
